short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app will show where a seller is registered on amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of not knowing who you are buying from on Amazon?! Well thanks to this application you can finally see where the company you are buying from on Amazon is located!!!!

Seller Check allows costumers to easily see where sellers on amazon are located.
